FAQ Frequently Asked Questions

  1. Home
  2. FAQ

Why would I want to keep track of my bills?

We always ask ourselves "where did out money go?". Now you can actually see!
You can also see who received your bill- maybe a friend or a relative?

Why does the app require a facebook login?

Where is Rachel is a social app and there is no better way to be social than facebook.
Do not worry! we do not use any details except your name and your profile picture. We will never post without your premission.

Can the app be used to track other things except money bills?

Yes! We have written the code in a way that allows to "Check In" any location based object with unique identification.
You can always contact us (see the About page).
